name.name: Unbiased Atlas Construction via Population (group-wise) DRAMMS Registration

software.description:
Unbiased atlas construction by group-wise dramms registration.

Can be used to construct a normal atlas from either a normal population or an abnormal population.

The tool will find a virtual space that represents the mean geometry, mean anatomy and voxel-wise mean intensity of the input population (hence unbiased).

If the input images are from an abnormality-bearing population, the above happens to normal regions only, and will create an unbiased normal-appearing atlas. The software can either take as input the manually annotated abnormality masks, or automatically detect and exclude abnormalities from atlas construction.
